title: [MEDIUM] Real-Time News Trading System
body:
## Vision Gap

K.I.T. should trade based on news events - current news-tracker is passive.

## Required Features

### News Sources
- CryptoPanic API
- NewsAPI
- Twitter/X sentiment
- Economic calendar (ForexFactory)

### Analysis
- Real-time sentiment scoring
- Impact prediction (high/medium/low)
- Asset correlation detection

### Automation
- Pre-programmed event reactions
- Example: CPI release -> position adjustment
- Example: Major hack news -> exit affected tokens
- Configurable response delays

### Safety
- News verification (multiple sources)
- Fake news detection
- Maximum position change per event

## Example Flow
1. Breaking: Fed raises rates
2. K.I.T. detects via multiple sources
3. Impact: HIGH for USD pairs
4. Action: Adjust forex positions
5. Alert user of changes made

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Real-time news ingestion
- [ ] Sentiment analysis works
- [ ] Automated responses configurable
- [ ] Safety limits enforced

## Priority: MEDIUM
